About Me

⤹ Here will be a lead text

Crafting visually experiences for web and interfaces

Front-end Developer and amateur Photographer

Coding is challenging which is why I love it. Studying and learning everyday. Very hands-on person and believe hard work pays off, sooner or later.

Summary

Building visual and functional interfaces for web, mobile and desktop.

  • Develop static websites and blogs with HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, AJAX, Jekyll, Git
  • Design of responsive website and optimizing websites for mobile display
  • Strict adherence to the W3C standards
  • Ensure accessibility and usability, cross-browser compatibility for all major Internet browsers and SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
  • Static site generation with Jekyll
  • Clean coding with comments
  • PSD to HTML5 / CSS3 & PDF / Document to HTML5 / CSS3 conversion
  • WordPress theme installation, customization, plug-in integration, CSS fixing
  • Source Control with Git, GitHub, and BitBucket
